meanings.definition: Poriferans: organisms belonging to the phylum Porifera, commonly known as sponges.
meanings.sent1: Poriferans are fascinating creatures that live in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study poriferans to learn more about marine life.
meanings.sent3: The poriferans at the aquarium seem to be having a sponge party!
meanings.sent4: In the vast ocean, poriferans are like tiny cleaning sponges filtering water.
meanings.sent5: Children love to touch poriferans at the touch tank exhibit.
